#!/bin/ash
# Fabric MC Server Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apk update
apk add --no-cache curl jq

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# --- User-configurable variables (panel fields) ---
MC_VERSION=${MC_VERSION:-latest}
LOADER_VERSION=${LOADER_VERSION:-latest}
FABRIC_INSTALLER_VERSION=${FABRIC_INSTALLER_VERSION:-latest}

# --- Fetch available versions from Fabric meta API ---
MC_LIST=$(curl -sSL https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/game)
LOADER_LIST=$(curl -sSL https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/loader)
INSTALLER_LIST=$(curl -sSL https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/installer)

# --- Resolve Minecraft Version ---
if [ "$MC_VERSION" = "latest" ]; then
    MC_VERSION=$(echo "$MC_LIST" | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable==true) | .version' | head -n1)
elif [ "$MC_VERSION" = "snapshot" ]; then
    MC_VERSION=$(echo "$MC_LIST" | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable==false) | .version' | head -n1)
else
    VALID=$(echo "$MC_LIST" | jq -r --arg v "$MC_VERSION" '.[] | .version == $v' | grep -m1 true || true)
    if [ -z "$VALID" ]; then
        echo "MC version $MC_VERSION not found. Using latest stable."
        MC_VERSION=$(echo "$MC_LIST" | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable==true) | .version' | head -n1)
    fi
fi

# --- Resolve Loader Version ---
if [ "$LOADER_VERSION" = "latest" ]; then
    LOADER_VERSION=$(echo "$LOADER_LIST" | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable==true) | .version' | tail -n1)
elif [ "$LOADER_VERSION" = "snapshot" ]; then
    LOADER_VERSION=$(echo "$LOADER_LIST" | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable==false) | .version' | head -n1)
else
    VALID=$(echo "$LOADER_LIST" | jq -r --arg v "$LOADER_VERSION" '.[] | .version == $v' | grep -m1 true || true)
    if [ -z "$VALID" ]; then
        echo "Loader version $LOADER_VERSION not found. Using latest stable."
        LOADER_VERSION=$(echo "$LOADER_LIST" | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable==true) | .version' | tail -n1)
    fi
fi

# --- Resolve Fabric Installer Version ---
if [ "$FABRIC_INSTALLER_VERSION" = "latest" ]; then
    FABRIC_INSTALLER_VERSION=$(echo "$INSTALLER_LIST" | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable==true) | .version' | head -n1)
else
    VALID=$(echo "$INSTALLER_LIST" | jq -r --arg v "$FABRIC_INSTALLER_VERSION" '.[] | .version == $v' | grep -m1 true || true)
    if [ -z "$VALID" ]; then
        echo "Fabric installer version $FABRIC_INSTALLER_VERSION not found. Using latest stable."
        FABRIC_INSTALLER_VERSION=$(echo "$INSTALLER_LIST" | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable==true) | .version' | head -n1)
    fi
fi

# --- Build server jar URL ---
SERVER_URL="https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/loader/${MC_VERSION}/${LOADER_VERSION}/${FABRIC_INSTALLER_VERSION}/server/jar"

echo "Minecraft Version: $MC_VERSION"
echo "Fabric Loader Version: $LOADER_VERSION"
echo "Fabric Installer Version: $FABRIC_INSTALLER_VERSION"
echo "Downloading server.jar ..."

# --- Download and rename to server.jar ---
curl -o server.jar -L "$SERVER_URL"

# --- Download default server.properties if not exists ---
if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    echo "Downloading default server.properties ..."
    curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/game_eggs/minecraft/java/server.properties
fi

echo "Fabric MC Server installation complete!"
